dcterms:creator: Liang-Chieh Chen
Yukun Zhu
George Papandreou
Florian Schroff
Hartwig Adam
dcterms:description: Spherical MNIST is constructed from the MNIST dataset by back projecting the digits into equirectangular projection with 160x80 resolution. The digit labels are used to train the source CNN (recognition model), but they are not used to train the KTN. Classification accuracy on the 360◦-ified test set is used as the evaluation metric.
dcterms:title: Spherical MNIST

dcterms:creator: Yu-Chuan Su
Dinesh Jayaraman
Kristen Grauman
dcterms:description: Pano2Vid is a real world 360◦ video dataset containing 86 videos from four categories: 'Hiking,' 'Parade,' 'Soccer,' and 'Mountain Climbing.' The models are trained to reproduce the convolution outputs of the source model, so no labels are required for training. The root-mean-square error (RMSE) of the final convolution outputs is used as the evaluation metric.
dcterms:title: Pano2Vid

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge Belongie
James Hays
Pietro Perona
Deva Ramanan
Piotr Dollár
C. Lawrence Zitnick
dcterms:description: Pascal VOC 2007 is a perspective image dataset with object annotations. The object bounding boxes are backprojected to equirectangular projection with 640x320 resolution. This dataset is used for evaluation only, and the accuracy of the detector network in Faster R-CNN on the validation set is used as the evaluation metric.
dcterms:title: Pascal VOC 2007
